title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-Native Era of Observability: How You Can Get Started Today (AIM220)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI原生时代的可观测性：如何立即开始 (AIM220)
abstract: Observability is entering an AI-native era where manual queries and endless dashboards are replaced by instant insights, root cause detection, and guided recommendations. In this session, you’ll learn how AI-native observability reduces MTTR, reveals root causes instantly, and empowers business and engineering teams alike. Ariel Assaraf, CEO of Coralogix, and Liran Hason, VP of AI, will share their vision for the future of observability and how Coralogix is leading the shift with Olly, the first AI-native observability agent built to turn telemetry into real-time clarity and impact. This presentation is brought to you by Coralogix, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 可观测性正在进入AI原生时代，手动查询和无尽的仪表板将被即时洞察、根因检测和引导式建议所取代。在本次会议中，您将了解AI原生可观测性如何降低MTTR、即时揭示根本原因，并同时赋能业务和工程团队。Coralogix首席执行官Ariel Assaraf和AI副总裁Liran Hason将分享他们对可观测性未来的愿景，以及Coralogix如何通过Olly引领这一转变——Olly是首个AI原生可观测性代理，旨在将遥测数据转化为实时清晰度和影响力。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Coralogix呈现。
